events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I want to request a refund as it doesn't fit me well and I am very disappointed.
The customer's request involves a refund due to sizing issues, categorizing the issue under Refund cluster.
Assigning the refund case to the customer support agent specialized in order returns and refund processing.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit as expected. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or washed so we can proceed with your refund?
Sure, the order number is #874521, and the jacket is unused and still in its original packaging.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back using the pre-paid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick help and will send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
We have sent the return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund immediately.
Just checking in to confirm that you have sent the jacket back and to offer any further assistance if needed.
Yes, I returned the jacket yesterday via the pre-paid label. Thanks again for the smooth process.
Your refund has been processed successfully and should reflect in your bank account within 3-5 business days.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about your refund experience with us.
